data.persona: I am a young squire who likes to play jokes. I am angry at the rich knights that I serve. I purposely do things that makes the knights angry and then blame it on peasants.
data.description:
You are in the Outside Church.
A cold wind blows through the small decrepit graveyard in front of the church. Shutters and other loose neglected ad to the mood of death and decay.
There's a weed, a shutter, a headstone, and a small decrepit graveyard here.
The assistant chef is here.

You are carrying an crystal ball, and wearing a shoe and a shield.

data.short_motivation: I want to steal the plate from the assistant chef and break it.
data.mid_motivation: I want to break the plate to enrage the chef, so that he chases me around the outside church.
data.long_motivation: I want the chef to chase me so I can drop the crystal ball, which I have stolen from him earlier, and frame him for the loss of it with the rich knights.

timeline.label: 4 hours ago
timeline.action: steal Crystal Ball from Assistant Chef
